description: One of the biggest surprises of the Nintendo Switch 2's reveal was its proposed accessibility. title: Answering the Nintendo Switch 2’s lingering accessibility questions

author: Andrew Webster
description:
The first Switch was such a hit that Nintendo decided not to mess with a good thing. Instead of releasing a successor that feels like a generational leap or a pivot in a new direction, it's following up the hugely successful original with the Switch 2 - a welcome upgrade that largely sticks to the formula. It looks about the same, works about the same, and plays most of the same games. It's the Switch, just better.

Nintendo's bet is that it doesn't have to wow people all over again, and so it made a sequel that's only as good as it needs to be. After spending a week with the new console, I've realized that good enough
title: Nintendo Switch 2 review: exactly good enough
